item.description:
***  RSVPs for the Dinner/Dance option have closed because we need to get the meal count into the hotel.  However, you can still come to the dance only and pay $20 at the door.  ***

If you are unable to come for the whole weekend, at least come for the dinner and dance .  It's the highlight of the weekend, being able to dance with somebody the right height.

The Dave Maklin Band will be excellent, they're an R & B, Funk, Dance, Mowtown band, 5 pieces, fantastic vocals and we will all be on the floor all night!

 Price: $65 Dinner and dance, paid in advance

           $20 Dance only, paid at the door

Time:  Cocktails - 6:00 PM

           Dinner - 7:00 PM

           Dance - 8:00 PM

See the flier on our website for more details. http://www.hubtall.org/events/flyers/2012_07_13-15--The%20Boston%20Baked%20Beanstalks%20Weekend-Topix.pdf
item.name: The Boston "Baked" Beanstalk Weekend - Saturday Dinner/Dance
